from dataclasses import dataclass

@dataclass
class Triple:
    subject: str
    predicate: str
    object: str

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-START

def predict(triples: list[Triple]) -> str:
    if not triples:
        return ""

    sentences = []
    combined_sentence = ""
    for triple in triples:
        predicate = triple.predicate
        subject = triple.subject
        object_ = triple.object

        if predicate in (
            "associatedBand/associatedMusicalArtist",
            "background",
            "birthDate",
            "genre",
            "instrument",
            "origin",
            "activeYearsStartYear",
            "birthPlace",
            "birthYear",
            "occupation",
            "recordLabel",
            "deathPlace",
            "alternativeName",
            "activeYearsEndYear",
            "deathDate",
            "nationality",
            "professionalField",
            "musicFusionGenre",
            "musicSubgenre",
            "stylisticOrigin",
            "language",
            "officialLanguage",
            "derivative",
            "location",
            "governingBody",
            "leader",
            "leaderTitle",
            "country",
            "ethnicGroup",
            "parentCompany",
            "bandMember",
            "capital",
            "anthem",
            "currency",
            "demonym",
            "isPartOf",
            "distributingCompany",
            "training",
            "populationDensity",
            "meaning",
            "longName",
            "areaTotal",
            "foundingDate",
            "elevationAboveTheSeaLevel",
            "postalCode",
        ):
            sentence = f"{subject} is {object_}."
        else:
            sentence = f"{triple.predicate} of {triple.subject} is {triple.object}."

        if combined_sentence:
            combined_sentence += f" {sentence}"
        else:
            combined_sentence = sentence

    sentences.append(combined_sentence)
    return " ".join(sentences)

# EVOLVE-BLOCK-END
